title: Fight Censorship in Alabama
short: Our state-wide grassroots group needs your help to fight back against anti-library extremism and censorship
description: We support libraries who stand up to censorship. Your donation to Read Freely Alabama will help us combat anti-library extremist efforts statewide â€” through legislative advocacy, legal action, community organizing, voter education, and building the support infrastructure that libraries need to withstand political and financial pressure to censor their collections.
